subject: Re: [junit] FW: How to parametrize TestCases?
msgSnippet: ... Use JVM properties. JUnit-addons also provides an implementation of this kind of technique. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
Alexander Yavorskiy wrote:

>
> Hi,
> Does anyone know if it is possible to parameterize TestCases by specifying
> arbitrary arguments/properties so that they are readily available in "test*"
> methods? This seems like such an obvious thing to do, but I don't see any
> intuitive way in the framework to accomplish this.

Use JVM properties. JUnit-addons also provides an implementation of this
kind of technique.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
